summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Biodata Module (Fitur Biodata Mahasiswa dengan Approval System). Backend APIs fully functional (14 passed, 2 skipped). Frontend pages working correctly with proper validation.

issues: Missing DialogDescription warning in console - minor accessibility issue

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login (admin@siakad.ac.id)
Backend: Mahasiswa login (budi@mahasiswa.ac.id)
Backend: GET /api/mahasiswa/biodata - Get my biodata
Backend: GET /api/mahasiswa/biodata/change-requests - Get change request history
Backend: Access control - Admin denied on mahasiswa endpoints
Backend: GET /api/biodata/change-requests - Get all pending requests
Backend: GET /api/biodata/change-requests (no filter) - Get all requests
Backend: GET /api/biodata/list - Get all student biodata
Backend: GET /api/biodata/mahasiswa-belum-isi - Get students without biodata
Backend: Access control - Mahasiswa denied on admin endpoints
Backend: POST /api/mahasiswa/biodata - Create initial biodata (skipped - already exists)
Backend: GET /api/biodata/change-requests/{id} - Nonexistent returns 404
Backend: Unauthorized access correctly denied
Backend: Invalid token correctly rejected
Frontend: Mahasiswa Biodata page loads correctly
Frontend: Biodata data displayed in cards (Data Pribadi, Data Orang Tua, Alamat, Kontak)
Frontend: Ubah Data button functional
Frontend: Edit dialog opens with form fields populated
Frontend: Dokumen Pendukung section visible for change requests
Frontend: File upload buttons (KTP, KK, Akte) present
Frontend: Validation - Error toast shows when submitting without documents
Frontend: Riwayat Perubahan dialog functional
Frontend: Admin Verifikasi Biodata page loads correctly
Frontend: Status filter dropdown functional
Frontend: Search input functional
Frontend: Table displays with correct headers
skipped_tests: Backend: GET /api/biodata/change-requests/{id} - Detail test (no pending requests)
Backend: PUT /api/biodata/change-requests/{id}/review - Review test (no pending requests)
critical_code_review_comments: backend/.env has formatting issue on line 3: JWT_SECRET should be on separate line (python-dotenv warning)
DialogContent components missing description for accessibility (console warning)
seed_data_creation: Test biodata created for Budi Santoso (TEST_Budi Santoso) with test data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Biodata module fully tested. Mahasiswa Budi has existing biodata. No pending change requests exist. To test approve/reject flow, create a new change request first by uploading documents. File uploads stored in /app/backend/uploads/biodata/{mahasiswa_id}/
